description:
At Ribbon, we've developed an AI-powered interviewer that works round-the-clock to screen and evaluate candidates, helping hiring teams quickly identify top talent. Our intelligent automation accelerates the hiring process, benefiting startups, staffing agencies, and large companies by saving recruitment teams valuable time and effort in their screening. 

Ribbon reduces time-to-hire and improves candidate quality, allowing your team to focus on what truly matters—making excellent hires. We handle the repetitive tasks, enabling you to make quicker, more informed decisions.

Our mission is straightforward: help you find the right people, faster. Let Ribbon revolutionize your hiring process.
